name: aem-utils
description: A Gulp plugin to perform set of activities like generating client libraries for projects on Adobe Experience Manager

scripts.release: npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && git reset HEAD~2 && git add . && git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git push --tags && npm publish && git push -f origin master

author: Saurabh Khare
